alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Judith Basin, south central Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Belt, or 22 miles east of Great Falls, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highwood and Shonkin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
